name: Cirlce International Group
overview: Circle International Group, Inc. provides air freight forwarding and logistics services. The companyâ€™s freight forwarding and logistics services include inland transportation of freight; warehousing and inventory management; cargo assembly; and export packing and vendor shipment consolidation. Additionally, it offers global freight forwarding; charter arrangement and handling; electronic transmittal of logistics documentation; electronic purchase order and shipment tracking; document delivery to overseas destinations for customs clearance; and procurement of cargo insurance services. Circle International Group, Inc. was formerly known as The Harper Group, Inc. and changed its name to Circle International Group, Inc. in May, 1997. Circle International Group, Inc. was founded in 1898 and is based in San Francisco, California. Circle International Group, Inc. operates as a subsidiary of Ceva Logistics B.V.
